title: US Open tennis 2025: Carlos Alcaraz beats Jannik Sinner in men’s singles final – as it happened
summary: Carlos Alcaraz delivered an exceptional performance to secure his second US Open title. This victory marks his sixth grand slam championship overall. His impressive play solidifies his status as one of the top players in tennis.

title: Carlos Alcaraz powers past Jannik Sinner in four sets to win US Open
summary: Carlos Alcaraz claimed the title of world No. 1 after winning the US Open final against Jannik Sinner with a score of 6-2, 3-6, 6-1, 6-4. This victory marks a significant milestone in Alcaraz's career. Sinner put up a strong fight, but Alcaraz ultimately secured the championship.

title: Tuchel prepares to change tactics in pursuit of England World Cup glory
summary: The head coach is contemplating the use of more long throws and high balls in future matches. This decision follows the success of these tactics in their recent 2-0 World Cup qualifying victory over Andorra. The strategy aims to enhance the team's performance going forward.

title: New business secretary Peter Kyle going to China for trade talks this week
summary: The UK government has promoted the former science secretary in a cabinet reshuffle aimed at enhancing trade relations with Beijing. This move is part of ongoing efforts to revitalize economic ties with China. The appointment underscores the UK's strategic focus on strengthening international trade partnerships.
